about.subtitle: Finding motivation, coding what drives us
about.content_1: I decided to change my professionnal career to become a web developer. After self-learning the fondamentals of HTML, CSS and Javascript, then I could work with React in frontend and Node in backend.
about.content_2: Then I studied with the online education Openclassrooms with the goal of working as a professsional and become a Javacript web developer.

skills.subtitle: Continuous monitoring and learning
skills.content: Being a fullstack developer allows me to touch on several areas of web development.

client.title: Frontend
client.content: I work with Javascript and React. I recently added Typescript in my projects

server.title: Backend
server.content: With Node JS I work with frameworks like Express and Fastify. I code API with REST, graphQL ro websocket architecture

tools.title: Database
tools.content: I work with mySQL and sqlite3. FOr noSQL I use mongoDB

soft.title: Soft Skill
soft.content: Organized, autonomous, and rigorous in my work, I maintain a humble and calm approach in my professional interactions. You will find my AssessFirst profile here:

projects.subtitle: Projects
projects.content: Personal projects or projects developed with Openclassrooms
